item.title: [WIP] Sleek Template
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“brownsymcard, post:31, topic:156414”]The navbar/top of the layout area has a white glow which cant be achieved with a repeating gradient so the background would hafta large.
When I look at the psd file, the backlight layer is what im referring to. The backlight would make it so a large background image would hafta be used, or a diligent coder would be need to add in the glow from chopped images.[/quote]

Or just have the backlight go with the buttons, but ya I know I just added some of it for looks…

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Sleek Template
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:30, topic:156414”][quote author=brownsymcard link=topic=213391.msg1873584#msg1873584 date=1194457144]
Oh wow its been a while since ive been to this site (year or so?).

I would personally say the choppy border, also the text on the navbar is inconsistently sized and holds the most contrast in color detracting the eye from areas of greater importance.

This template would work well for a personal website or portfolio, just not too well for a large site. The only problem that comes here would be when coded, the radial gradient background should be replaced with a linear so a giant image size doesn’t need to be used.

Overall 6/10 imo
[/quote]

What radial gradient? It is a linear and ya I know about the border…[/quote]

The navbar/top of the layout area has a white glow which cant be achieved with a repeating gradient so the background would hafta large.
When I look at the psd file, the backlight layer is what im referring to. The backlight would make it so a large background image would hafta be used, or a diligent coder would be need to add in the glow from chopped images.

Read full topic

I would personally say the choppy border, also the text on the navbar is inconsistently sized and holds the most contrast in color detracting the eye from areas of greater importance.

This template would work well for a personal website or portfolio, just not too well for a large site. The only problem that comes here would be when coded, the radial gradient background should be replaced with a linear so a giant image size doesn’t need to be used.

Overall 6/10 imo[/quote]

What radial gradient? It is a linear and ya I know about the border…

item.title: [WIP] Sleek Template
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

Oh wow its been a while since ive been to this site (year or so?).

I would personally say the choppy border, also the text on the navbar is inconsistently sized and holds the most contrast in color detracting the eye from areas of greater importance.

This template would work well for a personal website or portfolio, just not too well for a large site. The only problem that comes here would be when coded, the radial gradient background should be replaced with a linear so a giant image size doesn’t need to be used.

Overall 6/10 imo
